meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

examples.korean: I keep forgetting what it feels like to sit down! 발음듣기 앉아 있는게 무슨 기분인지 자꾸 잊어버려요! User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. Miraklu(kend****) Web Collection

examples.korean: If you don't want them, toss them. 발음듣기 그것들이 원하는 것이 아니라면, 던져 버려요. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. skybird(blue****) Web Collection

examples.korean: Sometimes you forget to say goodbye to people. 발음듣기 가끔 당신은 사람들에게 작별인사를 하는 것을 잊어버려요 User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 낄낄(alsd****) Web Collection

examples.korean: I’m not even old and I forget things. 발음듣기 저는 나이가 많은 것도 아닌데 잘 잊어버려요. User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 바셀린(ki_b****) Web Collection

examples.korean: How do you lose a whole herd of reindeer? 발음듣기 아니,어떻게해서, 당신은 한무리의 순록들을 모두 잃어 버려요???? User translation Inaccurate information may be included due to the users' self-traslation. 안전지킴이(milk****) Web Collection
